array.name: bmi_status
array.item: less than 18.5 underweight, so you may need to put on some weight. You are recommended to ask your Doctor or a dietician for advice.
18.5 – 24.9 at a healthy weight for your height. By maintaining a healthy weight, you lower your risk of developing serious health problems.
25 – 29.9 slightly overweight. You may be advised to lose some weight for health reasons. You are recommended to talk to your Doctor or a dietician for advice.
over 30 moderately obese (classification of class 1 obese). Your health may be at risk if you do not lose weight. You are recommended to talk to your Doctor or a dietician for advice.
over 35 severely obese (classification of class 2 obese). Your health may be at risk if you do not lose weight. You are recommended to talk to your Doctor or a dietician for advice.
over 40 very severely obese (classification of class 3 obese). Your health may be at risk if you do not lose weight. You are recommended to talk to your Doctor or a dietician for advice.

resources.string: Bye! I\'m Damiano and I\'m from Ivrea, a small town in Piedmont where the Olivetti company was born, grew up and died. I\'m 22 years old and I\'m in my first year of the Master\'s degree: Artificial Intelligence at the University of Turin. I know and have used the following programming languages: C, Java, Kotlin, Haskell, Python. I am here thanks to the Erasmus+ program for the summer semester and I was impressed by the greatness of the Polytechnic and the beauty of Wroclaw.
